trustfund:
TF050618-PHRD-MADAGASCAR: SECOND MINING
            SECTOR REFORM PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Mineral Resources
            Governance Project for Madagascar were as follows: outcomes
            were moderately satisfactory, the risk to development
            outcome was high, the Bank performance was moderately
            satisfactory, and the Borrower performance was also
            moderately satisfactory. There were two lessons learned: 1)
            High-level scientific oversight is key to ensuring the
            success of a complex geology program. 2) A multi-stakeholder
            approach is critical to promoting good governance of mineral resources.
